title: COBOL-Utvecklare
description:
### **Uppdrag: COBOL-utvecklare – Kort- och betalningslösningar**


Ett uppdrag finns tillgängligt för en erfaren COBOL-utvecklare med djup förståelse för transaktionssystem inom betalområdet. Rollen innebär arbete med vidareutveckling och förvaltning av system som hanterar kortbetalningar, med särskilt fokus på Mastercard-relaterade flöden.


Du kommer att vara en viktig del i ett team som säkerställer stabil drift, korrekt hantering av betalningar och effektiv utveckling av affärskritiska funktioner. Arbetet sker i en tekniskt komplex miljö där höga krav ställs på säkerhet, precision och realtidsbearbetning.

#### **Arbetsuppgifter:**

* Vidareutveckling och förvaltning av befintliga COBOL-baserade system
* Analysera, designa och implementera lösningar kopplade till korttransaktioner
* Arbeta med systemflöden relaterade till Mastercard och dess standarder
* Säkerställa att systemet följer regelverk som ISO 8583 och ISO 8585
* Arbeta agilt och samarbeta nära med andra utvecklare, testare och verksamhetsrepresentanter

#### **Kravprofil:**

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av COBOL-programmering i större, komplexa systemmiljöer
* God förståelse för kortbetalningsflöden och transaktionshantering
* Praktisk kunskap om ISO 8583 och/eller ISO 8585-standarder
* Erfarenhet av Mastercard-transaktioner eller liknande betalnätverk
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta ansvar för leverans i en förvaltnings- och utvecklingsmiljö

#### **Meriterande:**

* Tidigare erfarenhet av realtidsbearbetning och kortsystem inom betalningsindustrin
* Erfarenhet av felsökning i transaktionsmiljöer med höga krav på tillgänglighet och driftsäkerhet

**Om Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Backendutvecklare-Stockholm
description:
### **Uppdrag: Backendutvecklare med agilt ledarskap – Digitala inköps- och betalningslösningar**


Vi söker en erfaren backendutvecklare som även besitter ett naturligt servant leadership och driv inom agila arbetssätt. I detta uppdrag kliver du in i ett tvärfunktionellt team med uppdrag att utveckla och effektivisera digitala flöden kopplade till inköp och betalning. Du kommer att kombinera tekniskt djup inom modern backendutveckling med förmågan att stärka teamets samarbete, leveransförmåga och agila mognad.


Arbetet bedrivs i en teknisk miljö som kännetecknas av mikrotjänstarkitektur, eventdrivna lösningar och moderna programmeringsspråk – med Kotlin och Java i centrum. Uppdraget ställer krav på både teknisk skärpa och ett prestigelöst, coachande ledarskap i teamets vardag.

#### **Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter:**

* Utveckla robusta och skalbara backendlösningar för affärskritiska digitala tjänster
* Arbeta med Spring Boot, REST API:er och eventdriven arkitektur i en mikrotjänstmiljö
* Aktivt stötta teamet i agila arbetsformer och driva förbättringar i sprintplanering, dagliga möten och retrospektiv
* Fostra ett öppet klimat där teamet kan växa, leverera effektivt och ta gemensamt ansvar
* Bidra till tekniska beslut och kontinuerlig förbättring av kodbas, arkitektur och arbetssätt

#### **Kvalifikationer:**

* Gedigen erfarenhet av backendutveckling i Kotlin och/eller Java (minst 4 år)
* Djup kunskap inom Spring Boot och REST API-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av mikrotjänstarkitektur och eventdrivna lösningar
* Tidigare arbete i rollen som Scrum Master, agil coach eller motsvarande med bevisad förmåga att utveckla team

#### **Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av datamodellering och dataplattformar
* Intresse för verksamhetsnära system, konfigurationsarbete och teknisk förvaltning

title: Fullstackutvecklare Java/Kotlin/React
description:
### **Uppdrag: Fullstackutvecklare – Kotlin, Java, React & mikrofrontends i affärskritiska system**


Vi söker en skicklig fullstackutvecklare som vill vara med och utveckla skalbara digitala lösningar inom inköp och betalning. I detta uppdrag ingår du i ett tvärfunktionellt team där modern teknik kombineras med nära samverkan med produktägare, verksamhet och arkitekter.


Du kommer att arbeta både med nyutveckling och vidareutveckling av plattformar som är centrala för affärsflöden – där backend byggs i Kotlin/Java med Spring Boot och frontendlösningar realiseras i React och mikrofrontend-arkitektur. Rollen omfattar även arbete med datamodellering, integration mot centrala dataplattformar samt konfigurations- och förvaltningsarbete av befintliga lösningar.

#### **Ditt ansvar omfattar:**

* Fullstackutveckling i Kotlin, Java och React
* Skapa och underhålla REST API:er i en mikroservicestruktur
* Utveckla komponenter enligt mikrofrontendprinciper
* Arbeta i nära dialog med produktägare och arkitekter för att omsätta affärsbehov i hållbara tekniska lösningar
* Bidra till datamodellering och systemintegrationer mot ERP och dataplattformar
* Hantera teknisk förvaltning och konfiguration i en verksamhetsnära kontext

#### **Kvalifikationer:**

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av utveckling i Kotlin och/eller Java
* Gedigen kunskap om Spring Boot och API-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av frontendutveckling i React och mikrofrontend-arkitektur
* Van att arbeta i agila team nära affär och teknik
* Förmåga att förstå helheten i affärsflöden och bidra till lösningsdesign

#### **Domänkunskap – krav att ha erfarenhet av minst ett område:**

* Procure-to-Pay-processer (inköp, lager, försörjning)
* Integrationer med SAP S/4HANA
* Tidigare arbete i ERP-implementeringsprojekt
* Erfarenhet från processindustri eller produktionsnära IT

#### **Meriterande:**

* Praktisk erfarenhet av datamodellering och arbete med moderna dataplattformar
* Intresse för affärsnära systemförvaltning och teknisk konfiguration

title: Senior Frontend Utvecklare
description:
### **Uppdrag: Senior Frontendutvecklare – Digitala kundgränssnitt i modern plattform**


Ett uppdrag har öppnats för en erfaren frontendutvecklare med passion för moderna gränssnitt och avancerad komponentutveckling. I denna roll kommer du att vara en nyckelperson i att skapa framtidens användarupplevelse i en kundfokuserad digital miljö. Utvecklingen sker främst i applikationer och inloggade tjänster – med syfte att förbättra allt från informationsflöde till skadehantering och möjligheten att göra egna förändringar som kund.


Organisationen befinner sig i ett teknikskifte där ett nytt frontendramverk byggs upp från grunden. Den nya plattformen möjliggör återanvändbara komponenter och enhetliga gränssnitt genom en whitelabel-struktur – vilket bidrar till snabbare utvecklingstakt och en konsekvent designupplevelse över olika produkter.

#### **Ditt uppdrag:**

* Designa och bygga skalbara, återanvändbara komponenter enligt moderna frontendprinciper
* Arbeta med API-integrationer och eventdrivna arkitekturer
* Vara delaktig i formandet och vidareutvecklingen av frontendarkitektur och tekniska riktlinjer
* Samarbeta i tvärfunktionella team med UX-designers, backendutvecklare, arkitekter och produktägare
* Ta ansvar för leverans från idéstadiet till färdig lösning i produktion
* Driva teknisk utveckling i en komplex miljö med flera parallella initiativ
* Tydligt kommunicera tekniska lösningar till olika intressenter – både tekniska och icke-tekniska

#### **Vi söker dig som har:**

* Minst 7 års erfarenhet som frontendutvecklare
* Djup förståelse för komponentbaserad utveckling och återanvändbara gränssnitt
* Erfarenhet av att leda teknisk förändring i större utvecklingsorganisationer
* Förmåga att förklara komplex teknik på ett lättbegripligt sätt
* Vana att arbeta med tillgänglighetsanpassning, designbibliotek och CMS-migreringar
* Erfarenhet av samarbete över plattformar (webb, iOS, Android)
* Intresse och förståelse för low-code- och less-code-lösningar

#### **Teknisk miljö:**

* **React**
* **TypeScript**
* **GraphQL**
* **Microfrontends**
* **Kubernetes**

#### **Personliga egenskaper:**

* Du är trygg i din roll och van att ta ansvar från start till mål
* Du kommunicerar tydligt och kan inspirera och vägleda andra
* Du är lösningsfokuserad och arbetar strukturerat även i komplexa miljöer
* Du ser kunskapsdelning och lärande som en självklar del av det dagliga arbetet

**Om Rasulson Consulting**

title: Frontend Developer
description:
*APPLICATION DEADLINE: July 22nd*

  

Bitrefill is the leading crypto e-commerce site worldwide, we make it easy for people to live on crypto around the world, fostering a circular economy that allows people to opt out from the traditional banking systems and embrace freedom!

### **Your Mission:**


We're looking for a Frontend Developer who thrives on building robust, high-performing, and maintainable user-facing applications. You'll work on critical parts of our web platform, helping us deliver seamless, fast, and scalable experiences to our users around the world — enabling millions of people to take full advantage of the cryptocurrency financial revolution for the first time. Our users span over 170 countries, each with different expectations and levels of digital trust. In crypto, that means solving complex problems around reliability, performance, and usability.

### **Our Tech Stack:**

* TypeScript
* React/Redux
* Express.js
* Node.js
* MongoDB, MySQL
* Amazon AWS, Kubernetes

### **Your Responsibilities:**

* Building and shipping new features and products, as well as maintaining and improving old code
* Architect reusable components and shared logic to ensure consistency and scalability across the app
* Improve performance, reliability, and loading times across the frontend stack
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of our frontend development environment (build tools, linting, testing, CI/CD)
* Help shape our internal standards around frontend quality, documentation, and testing
* Working closely with various developers and designers to ensure optimal prioritization and streamlined deployment
* Be hungry to learn, fast to execute, do a lot with little, and care strongly about your product and users
* Be a team player and a good friend who will contribute to our unpretentious culture

### **You Bring With You:**

* Located in Europe/LATAM timezone
* Minimum of 3+ years’ of Frontend experience and 5+ years of general programming experience
* Frontend skills with a strong focus on React and TypeScript
* Solid understanding of application state management, modern frontend tooling and common design patterns
* A strong digital portfolio that demonstrates the above
* Strong written and verbal English communication skills


It's a plus if you also have experience in running and optimizing large scale web applications or websites (100k+ monthly users). If that's the case, you would also focus on the performance, optimization, functionality and architecture of our web app and commercial platform

### **We Offer:**


You'll become part of a **remote** and **fast-paced** workplace made of talented people with high **ambitions** for a world where crypto is money for everyday use. Bitrefill believes in the **freedom** to work remotely and in offering our team members **flexibility** - we've build our entire business around this. On top of that, we offer various **perks** to make your experience with us the best it can be! Check them out here.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom test och analys
description:
Har du erfarenhet av teknisk utveckling och ett intresse för avancerade testmiljöer och dataanalys? Hos vår kund får du möjlighet att arbeta med mjukvaruverktyg, simuleringar och testdata i framkant.

**Att jobba inom test och analys**

  

Hos vår kund får du en central roll i utvecklingen och vidareutvecklingen av analys- och databearbetningsverktyg kopplade till avancerade testmiljöer. Du kommer att stötta testverksamheten genom att skapa och anpassa mjukvaruverktyg som används både vid simuleringar och i skarpa tester av flygsimulatorer. Rollen innefattar även analys av testdata för att säkerställa att styrsystemen uppfyller högt ställda säkerhets- och funktionskrav.


Vår kund arbetar agilt med en stor variation av uppdrag inom sektionen, vilket skapar goda möjligheter för både fördjupning och breddning inom området. Detta är en roll för dig som är nyfiken på flygteknik, avancerade system och framtidens lösningar – både för bemannade och obemannade system.


Rollen passar såväl dig som har ett par års erfarenhet från tech- eller industribranschen, som dig som har arbetat med flyg, dataanalys eller testmiljöer och nu vill ta nästa steg i karriären.

 **Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent**

Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos vår kund**.** Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet, men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.


Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hosvår kund samt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos vår kund.

**Vi söker dig som:**

  

* Har en teknisk utbildning som civilingenjör eller högskoleingenjör
* Har en inriktning som exempelvis teknisk fysik, maskinteknik med fokus på fluida och mekatroniska system, flyg- och rymdteknik, datavetenskap, elektronik eller liknande
* Erfarenhet av programmering och dataanalys (t.ex. Python, Git, Matlab, Linux)
* Har ett stort intresse för flyg och/eller teknik


För att passa in hos vår kund är du en person som är nyfiken på både dina arbetsuppgifter och dina kollegor. Du trivs i en kultur där man hjälper varandra, samarbetar och generöst delar med sig av sin kunskap. Du bidrar aktivt till en positiv arbetsmiljö genom att vara öppen för nya perspektiv, bygga trygga relationer och främja en stark sammanhållning i teamet.  

  

**Ansökan**

  

Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan snarast möjligt. Om du har du frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta Tech Recruiter Lema Naderi på lema.naderi@nexergroup.com


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

 **Om Nexer Tech Talent**

*Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent* *här**.*

title: Senior iOS Developer
description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.


We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them.


What We Offer:

* A chance to work on unique projects that explore and push the boundaries of what's possible.
* A fun and fair work environment where your you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
* A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
* Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


As a Senior iOS developer at Umain, your role will involve:

* Design, build & scale high-performance mobile applications using SwiftUI
* Collaborate and participate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features across both platforms.
* Participating in projects & teams alongside major brands and large organisations, and contributing to emerging tech trends and innovations.
* Drive and lead iOS projects. Be able to oversee a team of iOS developers, define standards, and manage team deliveries.
* Able to either work closely with, or take part in solving problems on other platforms like Android, cross-platform and more.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to ensure our apps are cutting-edge. Experience with ARKit & Vision Pro is a plus.
* Having a deep understanding of the mobile deployment pipeline.


Who You Are:

* You're an iOS developer (with 10+ years of experience) and a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
* You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
* You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
* You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


Why Umain?

* Career Framework:
We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.
* Work-Life Balance:
At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognising the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.
* Innovations and Learning:
Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.
* Skills Over Degrees:
We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.

**Are You Ready to Shape, Ship, and Scale with Us?**


If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**The summary**
---------------

  

We encourage that you **speak your mind** and join in on discussions to an almost extreme degree.


You have a true **passion for frontend coding and UI/UX**, a strong drive to learn new tech, and are eager to build great products at a product-focused company.  

You value high quality and output in your work and want to embrace our “cooldown” concept for R&D and cleanup after each sprint.

*We will only process applications where its clear in the CV/application that you are an EU citizen.*

**What are we as a business?**
------------------------------


Krea helps companies find the best possible financing for their business. Our platform makes it easy to apply, compare and select financing offers from multiple lenders.


We have already helped over 20 000 companies and we are growing rapidly. Now, our aim is to become the largest financing platform in northern Europe and to achieve that goal we need exceptional talents who want to be part of building something exceptional.

**What you’ll do**
------------------


You will be a part of taking the industry's most advanced platform to the next level by:

* Playing a key role in shaping our platform’s future—bringing your frontend skills, creative ideas, and ownership mindset to both code and UI/UX.
* Engaging in an open, transparent process to solve technical challenges.
* Contributing to future roadmaps and addressing pain points.

**Who we think you are**
------------------------


A good fit for this role is someone who is motivated by striving towards a common goal together with your colleagues. Someone who wants to innovate, learn, collaborate and be involved in both the technical journey and the journey of an evolving company. Someone who enjoys the work of finding a good level of abstraction in your technical solutions when it comes to the balance between value and effort.

**Qualified applicants will have experience/qualities such as:**

* 1-3 years of experience with frontend development.
* Writing scalable and maintainable typescript code.
* HTML/CSS: A genuin interest in maintaining excellent quality in the UI/UX space and collaborate with the product owner on design.
* A great communicator and team player.
* Fluency in English is required (Swedish is a plus)
* You must be an EU citizen.

**Our stack**
-------------


Our technical philosophy since launch has been to use the most suitable tool for the job. If we already know the tool, great! If we need to learn a new tool, great!

**For our frontends we use:**

* Typescript
* React
* NextJS
* React Query
* Zustand
* Tailwind

**For our backends we use:**

* Python (Django, fully typed)
* GraphQL
* REST
* Machine learning (python)
* GenAI

**For devops, binding it all together:**

* Docker
* Github actions
* Deployment on AWS

**And for testing:**

* Unit/integration testing in their respective languages

**Beyond competitive salary, we will also offer you:**

* Pension from the company.
* Fitness activity reimbursement (Friskvårdsbidrag).
* Great lunch discussions where we solve the bigger social and economic problems of the world and the opportunity to challenge your colleagues on table tennis.
* A hybrid work setup, with 3-4 days at our office in Stockholm City where you can enjoy spending time with your colleagues.
* Team events where we strive to deepen the company culture at Krea.

**For transparency, here’s how the normal process works from start to finish:**

  

* Apply
* Complete Alva labs tests (logic/personality)
* We screen your CV + Alva labs tests (Starting August 11th)
* Short initial interview (nothing to prepare)
* UI evaluation:
	+ Either complete a small React/Typescript/Tailwind coding test
	+ **Or**
	+ share an existing React app that showcases your UI skills
* Final interview

title: Frontend Developer - Growth Web
description:
**Join Aira's mission to transform Europe's energy future**


Are you passionate about building exceptional web experiences that drive growth and build iconic brands? Join Aira, a pioneering Swedish tech company, and help us craft our digital front door with cutting-edge frontend technology!


Aira is at the forefront of clean energy technology. 10% of Europe's CO₂ emissions are caused by residential heating, and energy bills are out of control. Aira is here to change that.


With our intelligent Aira Heat Pump at the heart, we're making the switch to clean energy-tech easier and more affordable. Helping Europe turn off gas and slashing energy costs one home at a time.


Founded in 2022, and with 1000+ employees and counting, Aira is driving the clean energy revolution by providing homes with modern clean energy-tech solutions such as solar power, battery storage solutions and heat pumps. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Poland, an HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, and hubs across the UK, Germany, and Italy, Aira is well on track to install clean energy-tech into 5 million homes by 2034.

**We are now looking for a talented Frontend Engineer to join our team in Stockholm, focusing on our public website and lead generation platform.**


This is a unique opportunity to take technical ownership of our most visible platform, ensuring it not only converts visitors into leads but also consistently elevates our brand perception through high-performance, scalable web solutions.

**What you'll be doing**

**Build high-converting web applications** using React and Next.js that directly impact our lead generation and revenue goals. You'll own the technical implementation of our public website, ensuring every component drives measurable business results.

**Optimize** **for performance and conversions** by implementing SEO best practices, managing Core Web Vitals, and building A/B testing infrastructure that enables data-driven decision making across marketing and product teams.

**Integrate headless CMS solutions** to empower our content and marketing teams while maintaining developer velocity and site performance. You'll architect content workflows that scale with our rapid growth.

**Deploy and** **maintain** **production applications** on Vercel, managing CI/CD pipelines, monitoring performance metrics, and ensuring 99.9% uptime for our mission-critical lead generation platform.

**Collaborate cross-functionally** with product managers, designers, and data scientists to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions that support our goal of reaching 5 million homes by 2034.

**What you'll bring to the role**

  

* **React & Next.js** expertise - 3+ years building production applications with modern React patterns and Next.js features (SSR, SSG, ISR, API routes)
* **Vercel** deployment experience - Hands-on experience with Vercel's platform, edge functions, and performance optimization tools
* **Headless CMS integration** - Proven track record implementing Contentful, Sanity, Strapi, or similar headless solutions
* **SEO mastery** - Deep understanding of technical SEO, Core Web Vitals optimization, and search engine ranking factors
* **A/B testing & CRO** - Experience implementing testing frameworks (Optimizely, VWO, or similar) and analyzing conversion data
* **Data-driven development** - Proficiency with analytics tools and making technical decisions based on user behavior data

**Essential Skills:**

* TypeScript proficiency
* Advanced CSS skills (Tailwind CSS preferred)
* Experience with agile ways of working
* API integration and data fetching optimization
* Performance monitoring and debugging
* Multi-language/international website development

**Professional Requirements:**

* 4 days per week in our Stockholm office
* Strong English communication skills
* Experience working in fast-paced, growth-focused environments

**Please note**


As summer is a time when many of our team members are on vacation, our recruitment process will be slower than usual. We may not be able to review applications and start interviewing until early August, once everyone is back.


Thank you for your patience and understanding. We truly appreciate your interest in joining us, and we look forward to connecting with you soon!

**What is in it for you?**

* Gain hands-on experience in a fast-growing scale-up, with a supportive and inclusive culture, and career advancement opportunities
* Collaborate with diverse teams across international markets and launch products globally
* Develop and grow personally and professionally in an entrepreneurial-minded environment
* Thrive in a dynamic, solution-oriented culture, tackling challenges and driving meaningful solutions that make a positive impact on the world
* Influence the company's success, with a visible impact on product development and market growth
* Work with cutting-edge frontend technologies and modern development practices
* Enjoy our brand-new office at Norra Stationsgatan 93 in Stockholm. Conveniently located near public transport, with Sankt Eriksplan and Odenplan stations just a few minutes walk away


At Aira, we champion next-generation energy as well as diversity and inclusion. We firmly believe that a diverse workforce fosters innovation and creativity, enhancing our ability to serve customers and communities effectively. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives to join our team. Our commitment is to uphold equality and inclusivity, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to a better future for our people and the planet.
company_description: We are Aira. A Scandinavian company on a mission to disrupt residential heating by empowering people to join the clean energy revolution, one home at a time.

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
Senior Software Developer


**Date:** Jul 1, 2025
**Location:**Stockholm, SE
**Company:** Maquet Critical Care AB
**Remote Work:** 1-2 days at home (site based)  

**With a passion for life**  


Join our diverse teams of passionate people and a career that allows you to develop both personally and professionally. At Getinge we exist to make life-saving technology accessible for more people. To make a true difference for our customers – and to save more lives, we need team players, forward thinkers, and game changers.
Are you looking for an inspiring career? You just found it.  


**About this opportunity**

In Getinge Digital Solutions we work with connectivity and remote services, modernizing how medical devices can be used. The team works with embedded software (C++20), creating and maintaining connectivity applications close to medical devices to facilitate remote services.  

  

We aspire to be modern and agile in our approach to software development using SCRUM, CI/CD pipelines, and modern ways of coding.  



Our team is diverse and consist of both developers and testers located in Solna (Sweden), and Bengaluru (India), with good communication across the borders. We are one team!  


**What you will do**

In this role, your primary responsibility will be to design, develop and maintain embedded software together with the team as well as software interfaces towards other system parts. You will also help foster a constructive and learning environment for other members of the team.  



Examples of what you will do in your daily work:  


* Design and develop embedded C++ code on application layer
* Take responsibility of CI/CD pipelines and development environment together with the team
* Be part of making decisions about and releasing the team’s products
* Take shared responsibility of the team’s test tools (E.g. in house developed test tool in Go (Golang)
* Contribute to good collaborative environment with other teams

  



This position is based in Solna, Stockholm and offers a hybrid setup (3 office days, 2 remote days). Travelling is not expected in this position.  


**You will bring**

To be successful in this position, we believe that you have the following qualifications.  


* University education or equivalent experience
* 5-years of experience of C++ and embedded software
* Experienced in software design
* Experience with Git
* Fluency in Swedish and English, orally and written

  



Valued qualifications but not required.  


* Experience with Go (Golang)
* Experience with MQTT
* Experience with Google Protocol Buffers

  



In addition to your technical skills, we highly value your personality. We see that you are humble but willing to voice your opinions, and that you value differences in opinion. You are good at collaborating and communicating, with a social side. We also see that you are driven and can work independently in your work. We think you have an ambition for growth and an eagerness to keep up to date with the latest in software development.  


At Getinge we see ourselves as proactive and self-driven in learning and contributing to the continued development of our products and our organization's capabilities. We are Team Players, Forward Thinkers and Game Changers.  



We think you will thrive in a high-expectation environment and have an interest in our products.  


**Why join Getinge**

Getinge offers a job in a safe and informal work environment, where we appreciate close team collaboration. We keep an open dialogue between leaders and employees, as well as between teams. We are focused on developing people, and together we will create a plan for learning and competence development when you start your career with us.  



Getinge offer a competitive compensation and benefits package, including wellness allowances, generous family benefits and joint company activities. Everything to ensure we support your well-being and goals.  


**Application**

We ask you to submit your application in our recruitment system by clicking the 'apply now' button. We wish to receive your application no later than 2025-08-02. **Due to summer vacation, we want to inform you that applications will be processed starting in week 32.**  


Due to GDPR regulations we do not accept applications via e-mail.  



If you have any questions regarding the role, please contact Hiring Manager Daniel Axelsson at Daniel.axelsson@getinge.com or Recruiter Sofia Ekstrand at sofia.ekstrand@getinge.com. Please be aware that email responses may be delayed during July due to summer vacation.  



We look forward to receiving your application. We hope you will join us on our journey to become the world’s most desired MedTech company.  


**About us**With a firm belief that every person and community should have access to the best possible care, Getinge provides hospitals and life science institutions with products and solutions aiming to improve clinical results and optimize workflows. The offering includes products and solutions for intensive care, cardiovascular procedures, operating rooms, sterile reprocessing and life science. Getinge employs over 12,000 people worldwide and the products are sold in more than 135 countries.

#LI-SE1
company_description: Getinge is a global leading supplier of innovative medtech products and solutions within healthcare and life science.

title: DevOps Developer - Radio Base Control Systems
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------

 **About this Opportunity:**


We are now looking for a **newly graduated engineer** that will start as a DevOps Developer in our Radio Base Control System Build & CI/CD team. Our sector is responsible for the ControlSystem (both for embedded and for cloud) for Ericsson’s Radio Base Stations and our focus is on 5G and future 6G technologies.

 **What you will do:**


In the team you will work with development of the build system and the CI/CD pipeline for the Control System SW. You will work hands-on with the CI/CD pipeline and software integration for the Control System used in Ericsson’s Radio Base Stations. We are organized in teams where continuous improvement, innovation and knowledge sharing is part of the daily work and our focus is on Lean and Agile ways of working


You will contribute to maintaining and evolving our infrastructure for software integration, including automation of build, test and deployment flows, in close collaboration with development teams to ensure high-quality deliveries of our software.


You will gain hands-on experience in working with technologies such as Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes and Helm, as well as Linux and embedded build tools like Yocto.  

You will be part of a diverse and collaborative team with a mix of senior and junior colleagues, where learning and sharing knowledge is encouraged.

 **Skills you bring:**

* A bachelor´s or Master´s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Telecommunications, or Engineering Physics (recent graduates or with a few years of relevant experience)
* General programming skills and interests/experience in scripting languages e.g. Bash.
* Knowledge in GIT and Jenkins.
* Interests/experience in operating systems, especially Linux, and general handling of computers. Yocto knowledge is an advantage.
* Interests/experience related to building software, CI/CD pipeline and Kubernetes/Docker/Helm.
* Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technological areas.
* Strong communication skills, with proficiency in English.
* Willingness to work collaboratively in an agile team environment.
* A keen interest in the telecommunications field.
 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

 **Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Javautvecklare till SPP
description:
*Vill du vara med och bygga framtidens integrationslösningar i en verksamhet som verkligen gör skillnad?* Hos SPP Tech kombinerar vi innovation med hållbarhet och moderna tekniker för att skapa framtidens digitala lösningar. Teamet **Core & Integrations** söker nu en **Javautvecklare** – här blir du en del av ett engagerat team som ansvarar för företagets integrationslager, navet som kopplar samman interna system.


Just nu pågår en spännande modernisering där både plattform och integrationer flyttas till Azure, och som Javautvecklare får du en central roll i det arbetet. Du kommer också att vara med och utveckla integrationer mot externa system. Här jobbar du nära arkitekter, utvecklare och andra team, med stor möjlighet att påverka och ta ansvar i en miljö där samarbete står i fokus.

**I rollen kommer du att:**  

* Utveckla, förbättra och förvalta integrationer mot SPP:s interna system
* Arbeta med parprogrammering och kodgranskning för att säkerställa hög kvalitet
* Vara delaktig i vår molnresa och jobba med moderna cloudtjänster i Azure
* Ha möjlighet att påverka val av verktyg, tekniker och arbetssätt

Vi jobbar målstyrt och agilt med ett starkt fokus på ständiga förbättringar – både i våra lösningar och i hur vi samarbetar. Du uppmuntras till kontinuerligt lärande genom kurser, föreläsningar och interna Lunch & Learn-sessioner där vi delar kunskap och inspirerar varandra.

**Och vem är då du?**  

Eftersom du kommer att samarbeta med både ditt eget och andra utvecklingsteam inom SPP Tech är det viktigt att du är kommunikativ både på svenska och engelska. Du trivs med att dela kunskap, lösa problem tillsammans och bidra till en öppen och prestigelös teamkultur.

**Utöver detta ser vi gärna att du har:**  

✔ Minst 5 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling  

✔ Stark bakgrund inom Javautveckling  

✔ Vana att arbeta i moderna cloudmiljöer och med containerbaserad infrastruktur  

✔ Eftergymnasial utbildning inom systemutveckling eller liknande område

**Vår teknikstack är primärt:**  

* Java (Maven/Gradle), Spring Boot och Apache Camel
* GitHub Actions och CI/CD-pipelines
* SQL
* Testdriven utveckling (TDD)
* Azure som molnplattform, inklusive Azure Service Bus
* Inom en snar framtid: Docker och Kubernetes
**Att vara anställd på SPP**  

Vi tror på balans, trygghet och långsiktighet – både i arbetslivet och privat. Därför erbjuder vi ett generöst förmånspaket som främjar hälsa, flexibilitet och framtid.

**Ansökan**


Skicka in din ansökan genom länken I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Ants, så sök tjänsten via deras jobbportal.
Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta gärna rekryteringsansvarig Sofia Odeen på sofia.odeen@ants.se. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande – så vänta inte med din ansökan!

**Om oss**  

Vi är en del av norska Storebrand, tillsammans är vi en av Nordens ledande koncerner för sparande och försäkringslösningar. Vi utmärker oss bland annat genom vårt fokus på hållbarhet och ansvarsfulla investeringar.

*Med kandidatens samtycke görs en bakgrundskontroll under anställningsprocessens slutskede som innebär kontroll av personalia, ekonomiska förhållanden och juridiska frågor. Även CV och annan ansökningsdokumentation kan komma att verifieras.*

title: Senior Core Network as a Service User Plane Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Ericsson 5G core business is launching an innovative and highly dynamic unit that will change how we bring 5G solutions to the market, thus changing the way 5G core is delivered globally. We aim to build and deliver Cloud Native solutions “as a Service” on Hyper Cloud Providers (HCP).

  

You will have the opportunity to spearhead how the public cloud connects with core telco services and help build more elastic and fit-for-purpose capabilities, while venturing new business models. This will fundamentally change how we bring 5G services to the industry, making it more accessible, more versatile, and create new opportunities for innovation.

  

We will bring the standard methodologies of the SaaS industry in the public cloud to the realization of 5G services. We are looking for individuals who want to lead change in the industry, apply the latest technologies to a domain that society relies on day in and day out.

  

Come and join us and lead the industry change!

 **What you will do:**

* End-to-End Development: Drive the full lifecycle of our services, from crafting highly optimized code in Go and C/C++ to building comprehensive automated tests and robust deployment scripts.
* Architectural Excellence: Actively contribute to the design and implementation of secure, scalable, and highly reliable applications and services.
* Automated Delivery: Leverage and enhance our advanced Cloud-Native CI/CD pipelines to streamline and automate the entire software delivery process, from code commit to production.
* Operational Insight: Implement robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions to ensure the continuous reliability, availability, and optimal performance of our critical cloud-based applications.
* Innovation & Growth: Continuously learn and apply the latest trends and emerging technologies in cloud computing, actively sharing knowledge and contributing to the continuous growth of our company's technical expertise.
* Collaborative Impact: Thrive in a Lean, Agile, and DevSecOps environment, collaborating closely with your team members to deliver exceptional value to our customers.

 **The skills you bring:**

* Extensive experience (10+ years) in software development, with a strong focus on user plane functions in telecommunications.
* Deep understanding of core network architecture, particularly the User Plane Function (UPF) and its protocols (e.g., PFCP, GTP-U).
* Proven experience with high-performance networking, packet processing, and data plane optimization.
* Strong proficiency in programming languages C/C++ and Go.
* Good understanding of Packet Core Controller and Packet Core Gateway design.
* Experience with cloud-native development and technologies (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker, microservices).
* Experience with public cloud platforms such as Google Cloud Platform, AWS, or Azure.
* Experience with network function virtualization (NFV) and software-defined networking (SDN).
* Solid understanding of network security principles and practices.
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Core Network as a service Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Ericsson's 5G core business is launching an innovative and highly dynamic unit that will change how we bring 5G solutions to the market, thus changing the way 5G core is delivered globally. We aim to build and deliver Cloud Native solutions “as a Service” on Hyper Cloud Providers (HCP).

  

You will have the opportunity to spearhead how the public cloud connects with core telco services and help build more elastic and fit-for-purpose capabilities, while venturing new business models. This will fundamentally change how we bring 5G services to the industry, making it more accessible, more versatile, and create new opportunities for innovation.

  

We will bring the standard methodologies of the SaaS industry in the public cloud to the realization of 5G services. We are looking for individuals who want to lead change in the industry, apply the latest technologies to a domain that society relies on day in and day out.

  

Come and join us and lead the industry change!

 **What you will do:**

* End-to-End Development: Drive the full lifecycle of our services, from crafting highly optimized code in Go and C/C++ to building comprehensive automated tests and robust deployment scripts.
* Architectural Excellence: Actively contribute to the design and implementation of secure, scalable, and highly reliable applications and services.
* Automated Delivery: Leverage and enhance our advanced Cloud-Native CI/CD pipelines to streamline and automate the entire software delivery process, from code commit to production.
* Operational Insight: Implement robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions to ensure the continuous reliability, availability, and optimal performance of our critical cloud-based applications.
* Innovation & Growth: Continuously learn and apply the latest trends and emerging technologies in cloud computing, actively sharing knowledge and contributing to the continuous growth of our company's technical expertise.
* Collaborative Impact: Thrive in a Lean, Agile, and DevSecOps environment, collaborating closely with your team members to deliver exceptional value to our customers.

 **The skills you bring:**

* Strong Programming Foundation: Strong proficiency in Go and C/C++, coupled with hands-on experience in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform.
* Cloud Native Mastery: Deep practical experience with cloud-native development principles and technologies, including Kubernetes, Docker, and microservices architecture.
* Public Cloud Expertise: Proven experience working with major public cloud platforms such as Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), or Microsoft Azure.
* Networking Acumen: A solid understanding of core network architecture, including experience with Network Function Virtualization (NFV) and Software-Defined Networking (SDN).
* Security First Mindset: Strong understanding and practical application of network security principles and best practices.
* DevOps & Automation: Hands-on experience with modern development platforms and CI/CD tooling, specifically GitHub and GitHub Actions.
* Collaborative Spirit: You thrive in a collaborative, generative team culture, actively supporting your teammates and prioritizing customer success.
* Problem Solver & Learner: A curious mind with exceptional problem-solving skills, a passion for continuous learning, and a creative approach to technical challenges.
 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Stockholm or Gothenburg

**Req ID:** 764517

title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
We are Gretrix, a full-stack web development company specializing in marketing and analytics. From our interns to our executives, we value autonomy, flexibility, and humble openness. And we are always looking for driven individuals with strength of character and a willingness to learn. For the right person, there are ample opportunities for lateral and vertical growth.
  
  

We are seeking a talented Full-Stack Developer to join our team. This person should possess the knowledge to develop on both the front and back end and should be able to design, develop and maintain fully functioning platforms with databases and servers, without the use of 3rd party applications. The ideal applicant should have knowledge & experience with the following technology stacks: Laravel, JavaScript, HTML, PHP, Node, SQL/MySQL.
  
  

Duties of the position include, but are not limited to, participating in the design and creation of scalable software, writing clean, functional code on the front- and back-end, testing and fixing bugs or other coding issues, assisting team members with various issues/blockers that arise during the development process, collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize software features, and maintaining technical documentation related to software development processes.
  
  

If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, have a fail-forward mentality, and are passionate about developing desktop and mobile applications, we want to hear from you. At Gretrix, we offer ample opportunities for growth. If you are interested in this position and meet the qualifications, please submit your resume. Kickstart your career with Gretrix today!

title: Frontend Developer with focus on UX/UI
description:
At Evolution AB / Nolimit City, we're building cutting-edge gaming products that redefine how players experience online entertainment. As we continue to grow, we're looking for a Frontend Developer with a strong UX/UI focus, or a UX/UI Designer with frontend development chops, to join one of our expanding engineering teams.
 



  





 You'll play a key role in shaping the look, feel, and interactivity of products that reach a global audience—contributing not only to how things work but also how they feel. At Evolution, design and development are not siloed; you'll be an essential part of product decisions from day one, working in highly collaborative, autonomous teams.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 



* Design and build intuitive, responsive, and beautiful interfaces with React (Next.js) and TypeScript.
* Bring UX and UI designs to life—from wireframes to pixel-perfect implementation.
* Collaborate closely with product owners and engineers to craft seamless user experiences.
* Own the frontend from concept to production, including performance optimization, accessibility, and maintainability.
* Contribute to our design system and help shape a consistent visual language across products.
* Continuously experiment, iterate, and improve based on real user feedback and data.
* Be part of a team that values learning through iteration, experimentation, and shared responsibility.



  





**You Might Be a Great Fit If You** 



* Have solid experience with React, TypeScript, and modern CSS techniques.
* Possess a keen eye for design details, and care deeply about creating delightful user experiences.
* Enjoy bridging the gap between design and development.
* Are comfortable building advanced components.
* Believe in clean, maintainable code and smooth user flows.
* Have good communication skills in English and love working in a collaborative environment.



  





**Bonus Points** 



* Experience with Next.js, Redux Toolkit, or Headless CMSs like Strapi.
* Understanding of accessibility and web performance best practices.
* Familiarity with UI/UX testing tools or user research methods.
* An interest in gaming or digital entertainment interfaces.



  





**Technologies You'll Touch** 



* React / Next.js
* TypeScript / JavaScript
* Redux Toolkit
* CSS / Tailwind CSS
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Git (GitHub Actions)



  





**Who we are** 




 We care more about your potential than checking every box. If you're excited about building exceptional interfaces and love working in small, empowered teams, we want to hear from you.
 



  





 Join one of Sweden's fastest-growing tech companies and help us craft experiences that players around the world love.
 



  





 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
 



  





 Apply on LinkedIn, or send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
 



  





 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Front-end Developer
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Project Management
description:
**Looking for a workplace for the future?**
 At Telenor, you own your career. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to make the most of your dreams and expertise while contributing to technological innovations that are barely even imagined today. Innovations that we know will change the map for how we communicate and live our connected lives in the future. Are you looking for a workplace where you can make a difference in what matters most – relationships between people.
   

  

**What you will do**
 As a Front-end developer in our digital self-service team you will be vital in building the next iteration of our self-service platform. You will be part of transforming our current web and native applications to a new progressive web app, used by our consumer customers to manage their engagements. Being part of a DevOps team, you will also ensure an accessible, high-performing application with great quality.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop new and maintain existing features in our self-service platform, “Mitt Telenor”
* Build reusable code and libraries with high quality
* Performance optimization and accessibility compliance


**Who you are**
 You are an experienced software developer with a deep understanding of custom-built applications and strong expertise in Front-end, headless CMS and progressive web apps. Preferably also with experience in .Net and Cloud native solutions.
   

  

**Behaviors**
 You are proactive and take ownership of your work, always looking for ways to improve solutions and optimize performance. You lead by example, ensuring best practices and high standards across the team. You follow through on commitments, fostering reliability and trust. Above all, you act with integrity and respect, creating a culture of collaboration and transparency.
   

  

 Hard Skills
   

  

* Deep expertise in Front-end, preferable Vue.js and Vue 3.
* Hands on experience with Capacitor or similar cross platform solutions
* Hands on experience with Contentful or similar headless CMS
* Understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems
* Experience with cloud platforms (preferably AWS) and DevOps practices and tooling. Proficiency in database design (SQL and NoSQL), caching strategies, and performance tuning
* Strong security mindset, with knowledge of authentication, authorization, and data protection best practices


 Soft Skills
   

  

* Critical thinker and problem solver, able to navigate trade-offs between short-term deliverables and long-term system health
* Strong communication skills, capable of explaining complex problems to developers, architects, and business stakeholders
* Self-motivated and adaptable, embracing change and fostering continuous learning within the team


**Our promise to you**
*We are better together.*
 Here, you’ll be part of a family-like and inclusive culture, built on strong shared values and leadership that empowers you with both trust and confidence. We believe in enabling each other to act and make decisions, while always having each other’s backs through ups and downs.
   

  

*We support relationships and societies.*
 Telenor plays a vital role in the society, giving your work a greater purpose. Every day, we create value for millions of people and maintain a customer-first approach where human relationships are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

*We make room for life.*
 Work from home up to two days a week, where your role allows it. The rest of the time, we create magic together at the office. You also get two ‘give-me-a-break’ days per year for extra time off, and our flexible working hours help you balance your time. We also support you through every stage of life with our benefits package.
   

  

*We invite you to a career in motion.*
 Your development is at the center of our culture. We dedicate at least 40 hours per year for you to deepen your expertise, explore new areas, and develop in your role. Through Telenor Academy and other learning initiatives, you’ll have the tools and freedom to advance your career. When you want to broaden your horizons, we are present throughout the Nordics.
   

**Apply today!**
 Will you take the next step in your career with us? We look forward to your application!
 **Please note that we will start screeningprocess in September,** 
 so you can expect feedback from us then.
   

 If you have any questions or want to know more, feel free to contact hiring manager Mikael Rosenberg, mikael.rosenberg@telenor.se
   

  

**Good to know**
 As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**The summary** 




 We encourage that you speak your mind and join in on discussions to an almost extreme degree.
 



 You have a true passion for frontend coding and UI/UX, a strong drive to learn new tech, and are eager to build great products at a product-focused company.
 



  





 You value high quality and output in your work and want to embrace our “cooldown” concept for R&D and cleanup after each sprint.
 



*\* We will only process applications where its clear in the CV/application that you are an EU citizen.* 




  





**What are we as a business?** 




 Krea helps companies find the best possible financing for their business. Our platform makes it easy to apply, compare and select financing offers from multiple lenders.
 



 We have already helped over 20 000 companies and we are growing rapidly. Now, our aim is to become the largest financing platform in northern Europe and to achieve that goal we need exceptional talents who want to be part of building something exceptional. 
 



  





**What you’ll do** 




 You will be a part of taking the industry's most advanced platform to the next level by:
 


* Playing a key role in shaping our platform’s future—bringing your frontend skills, creative ideas, and ownership mindset to both code and UI/UX.
* Engaging in an open, transparent process to solve technical challenges.
* Contributing to future roadmaps and addressing pain points.



  





**Who we think you are** 




 A good fit for this role is someone who is motivated by striving towards a common goal together with your colleagues. Someone who wants to innovate, learn, collaborate and be involved in both the technical journey and the journey of an evolving company. Someone who enjoys the work of finding a good level of abstraction in your technical solutions when it comes to the balance between value and effort.
 



  





**Qualified applicants will have experience/qualities such as:** 



* 1-3 years of experience with frontend development.
* Writing scalable and maintainable typescript code.
* HTML/CSS: A genuin interest in maintaining excellent quality in the UI/UX space and collaborate with the product owner on design.
* A great communicator and team player.
* Fluency in English is required (Swedish is a plus)
* You must be an EU citizen.



  





**Our stack** 




 Our technical philosophy since launch has been to use the most suitable tool for the job. If we already know the tool, great! If we need to learn a new tool, great!
 



  





**For our frontends we use:** 



* Typescript
* React
* NextJS
* React Query
* Zustand
* Tailwind



  





**For our backends we use:** 



* Python (Django, fully typed)
* GraphQL
* REST
* Machine learning (python)
* GenAI



  





**For devops, binding it all together:** 



* Docker
* Github actions
* Deployment on AWS



  





**And for testing:** 



* Unit/integration testing in their respective languages



  





**Beyond competitive salary, we will also offer you:** 



* Pension from the company.
* Fitness activity reimbursement (Friskvårdsbidrag).
* Great lunch discussions where we solve the bigger social and economic problems of the world and the opportunity to challenge your colleagues on table tennis.
* A hybrid work setup, with 3-4 days at our office in Stockholm City where you can enjoy spending time with your colleagues.
* Team events where we strive to deepen the company culture at Krea.



  





**For transparency, here’s how the normal process works from start to finish:** 



* Apply
* Complete Alva labs tests (logic/personality)
* We screen your CV + Alva labs tests (Starting August 11th)
* Short initial interview (nothing to prepare)
* UI evaluation:
* Either complete a small React/Typescript/Tailwind coding test



**Or** 



* share an existing React app that showcases your UI skills
* Final interview

title: Full stack developer (remote Sweden / Stockholm)
description:
QBank is looking for an ambitious full stack developer with a focus on Remix/React Router, PHP and Go to join our team in Stockholm.  This is a great opportunity to become part of a successful SaaS company within the Digital Asset Management (DAM) space. You will be part of a cross functional team working with developing new features and functionality in our platform along with integrations and maintenance.
 





 For this role we are looking for a candidate that either lives in Stockholm or that can work remotely from within Sweden. 
 




  





**What you will be doing** 



* Work closely with UI/UX-designer, Head of Product and CTO to meet customer expectations and requirements in implementation projects.
* Be a key player in developing new functionality in QBank products.
* Work closely with the rest of the team and the CTO to enhance the platform architecture, with an opportunity to influence the long term direction.
* Work with challenging assignments in an environment that promotes personal skill growth



  





**Who are you?** 



* You are motivated by delivering solutions that emphasize quality and customer satisfaction
* You are passionate about writing qualitative, modular and loosely coupled code.
* You are a fast learner and have the ability to use what you have learned to improve existing implementations
* You are a team player, but can also drive implementation projects on your own



  





**Required skills** 



* Excellent knowledge about common programming patterns and paradigms, such as object oriented programming (OOP) and functional programming
* Excellent knowledge of PHP, Go and modern javascript frameworks, such as React Router / Remix.
* Excellent knowledge of APIs and common patterns/paradigms such as RESTful APIs and GraphQL
* Strong knowledge about version management in general and Git in particular
* Strong knowledge about relational databases in general and Postgresql in particular
* Strong knowledge about modern front end development, including Typescript, CSS and CSS preprocessors.
* Excellent communication skills in English and Swedish



  





**Desired skills** 



* Experience with popular PHP frameworks like Laravel, Symfony and Slim
* Experience with SSO and OAuth
* Experience with Linux
* Experience with agile methodologies
* Experience with event buses like Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ or similar
* Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
* Experience with CI/CD in general and NX in particular



  





**About QBank** 





 QBank is a successful SaaS company within Digital Asset Management. Our main focus is on the Nordic market, but we also serve international customers around the globe. We are a team of 25 highly engaged and skilled people. We are working from an office in central Stockholm with great communications.
 




  






 QBank provides enterprise customers with central management and distribution of digital assets, often with integration to business-critical solutions such as PIM, ERP, MDM, E-commerce platforms, Social Media platforms etc

title: Software Engineer
description:
Are you passionate about APIs and ready to shape the future of API management? Join us to work with cutting-edge technology, drive innovation, and take your skills to the next level!
   

  

 Join our dynamic team at Tele2, where Digital Capabilities & Technology (DCT) is the engine behind our products and services. As the essential enabler of our commercial ambitions, DCT brings automation and simplicity to the telecommunications industry, revolutionizing the way we connect and communicate. Within our organization, you’ll find everything from the backbone infrastructure of technology and IT systems, serving both our external & internal customers, to advanced analytics, AI creation, and frontend development. Our team plays a vital role in ensuring reliable and premium services through delivering exceptional experiences to our end customers, both Consumer and Enterprises, all the while supporting our colleagues within Tele2.
   

  

**About The Role**
 You will be an integral part of the API Team, enabling customers to access Tele2 services via APIs from various frontend channels. Our mission is to deliver an exceptional experience for both consumer and business customers by providing the necessary data they need. We offer services that allow data to be consumed by other applications and systems, managing these services from start to finish. Our team operates within the Microsoft stack, fostering a culture where teamwork and inclusion are paramount.
   

  

 Your tasks and responsibilities will include (but are not limited to):
   

  

* Developing and maintaining APIs built in .Net
* Managing and maintaining Azure API Management
* Overseeing the internal developer portal Backstage
* Communicating and supporting numerous stakeholders as a central component
* Providing specialist support across the organization for API management
* Sharing your expertise with the team and learning new skills from others
* Adhering to patterns that promote robust services and continuously improving the team’s capabilities


**What we look for:**
 We are a collaborative team that works closely with other backend and frontend teams to coordinate our efforts. Maintaining strong relationships with architects and being able to navigate unclear information to create our own requirements is crucial.
   

  

 To be successful in this role and a good fit for our team, you should have a strong ambition to develop new functionalities while managing and maintaining existing solutions.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe that you have:**
* At least some years of experience in API development using .Net
* Experience with Azure or other cloud platforms
* Knowledge of Docker, deploy pipelines, and Kubernetes terminology
* Some experience with JavaScript/React for working with Backstage
* Basic knowledge of security concepts (encryption with keys, SSL/TLS, HTTPS)
* A proactive and curious mindset

title: Senior Backend Developer (Node.js/TypeScript)
description:
**About the job** 




  





 Arratech is building the trusted infrastructure behind global e-invoicing and e-reporting. Our mission is to make digital compliance frictionless—empowering governments, enterprises, and service providers to connect securely, scale confidently, and trade freely. From access points to continuous transaction controls, we design with purpose, move with momentum, and earn trust daily. If shaping the future of regulatory tech on a global scale excites you, you’ll thrive here.
 



  





**Senior Backend Developer (Node.js/TypeScript)** 




 We are looking for a skilled Senior Backend or Fullstack Developer to join our agile development team. Both co
 **ntract-based consultants (immediate availability)** 
 and
 **permanent positions (on-site)** 
 are relevant. You have solid experience with Node.js and TypeScript, and a strong understanding of AWS cloud services, particularly in building and deploying serverless architectures.
 



  





 You’re familiar with database technologies, event-driven systems, and the broader landscape of cloud-native development. Experience with DevOps practices in AWS (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure-as-code, monitoring) is a strong plus.
 



  





 You thrive in a collaborative environment and are comfortable working in agile teams, participating in daily standups, sprint planning, and iterative development cycles.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




 As a Senior Backend Developer at Arratech, you will play a central role in building and maintaining robust, scalable backend API and services using Node.js and TypeScript. You will work within a modern, serverless AWS infrastructure, helping shape and evolve the architecture and delivery of our SaaS platforms.
 



  





 Your responsibilities will include:
 


* Designing, developing, implementing and maintaining secure, well-documented, and maintainable APIs and services using Node.js/TypeScript within a serverless architecture (e.g., AWS Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3).



  




* Participating in system architecture and design discussions, helping define technical direction and best practices for scalable cloud-native applications.
* Collaborating closely with product managers, frontend developers, and stakeholders to deliver high-quality features and continuous improvement through agile workflows (sprint planning, standups, retrospectives).
* Writing automated tests and ensuring code quality through CI/CD pipelines, code reviews, and monitoring practices.
* Contributing to infrastructure-as-code setups (e.g., AWS CDK or CloudFormation) and improving deployment and observability practices.



  





**Requirements** 



* 5+ years of professional backend or fullstack development experience
* Proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript
* Experience designing and deploying serverless components on AWS
* Strong knowledge of databases (SQL and/or NoSQL) and event-based architectures
* Familiarity with agile workflows and team collaboration tools



**Nice to have** 



* DevOps experience in AWS (e.g., CloudFormation/CDK, CI/CD, observability)
* Frontend experience with modern JavaScript frameworks
* Interest in or experience with API standards and secure integrations



  





**What we offer**




  





**Flexibility & Work-Life Balance:** 




  





 We understand the importance of a healthy work-life balance and offer flexible working arrangements, including remote work options and adaptable schedules, to ensure our team members can thrive both professionally and personally. We prioritize outcomes and trust our employees to manage their time effectively, fostering an environment where well-being and productivity go hand-in-hand.
 



  





**Rapid growth in a startup environment:** 




  





 We’re a startup, which means you’ll wear many hats, solve real problems, and grow faster than you thought possible. Learning is baked into the job, with access to mentorship, skill-building, and chances to develop your career.
 



  





**Having fun is non-negotiable:** 




  





 We offer a competitive compensation package and a culture of working hard and playing hard. We believe in the importance of team building and having fun as cornerstones for being productive and building something awesome.
 



  





  





**A team that trusts and delivers:** 




  





 We move fast, but never solo. We believe in clarity, high trust, and feedback that makes us all better. You’ll work with sharp people who care deeply about what we do and how we do it.
 



  





  





**Apply now.** 




  





 Applications will be evaluated when received, so please apply as soon as possible.
 



  





 All applications must be submitted in English and are treated confidentially.
 



  






 A note to recruiters:
 





 We do not allow external search party solicitation. Presentation of candidates without written permission from the Arratech team is not allowed. If this occurs, your ownership of these candidates will not be acknowledged.

title: Java Developer
description:
Dedicated to powering entrepreneurs, Qred is a profitable, fast-growing fintech scale-up bank. In just 10 years, we’ve grown from a startup to hitting 1 billion SEK in annual revenue supporting over 50,000 entrepreneurs and helping create 10,000+ jobs every year. We combine smart tech with real-world experience to make funding simple, fast, and fair for entrepreneurs who need it most. With strong backing, a flat organization, and bold growth plans, we’re now looking for a Java Developer to join us and shape the future of small business owners.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Java developer at Qred, you'll join a team responsible for all payments in the company, consisting of other Java developers, one Product Manager, one Tech Lead and an Engineering Manager. This approach enables us to work together efficiently, ensuring full control, ownership, and accountability for the lifecycle of our products.
   

  

 We also believe in the trust in our developer’s capability of implementing, testing, reviewing, deploying daily, and operating their software in production.
   

  

**Requirements**
* A flexible and positive mindset as well as strong team spirit
* Proven knowledge and around 3-5 years of work experience in writing, releasing and maintaining backend applications using the following techs:
+ Java
+ Spring
+ JPA
+ PostgreSQL
+ Amazon Web Services


**Why join us?**
 This is the place to be if you’re looking for a place to grow. Qred is growing fast, and our Qredsters along with it. With a non-bureaucratic organization and delegated responsibilities, we make sure there’s a short path from idea to action. In addition to our great culture, you get to work with the latest cutting-edge techniques offered by AWS, responsibility for the whole development chain, and last but not least a bunch of new competent colleagues to learn from!
   

  

**One last thing**
 This is a full-time, permanent position based from our office in Stockholm (Drottninggatan 98). While we encourage a hybrid setup, we do expect you to be at least three days per week at the office. Don’t wait to send in your application, we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. The start date is flexible, but the right candidate can join us immediately.

 Qred is an international FinTech scale-up that specializes in digital financing solutions for small businesses, with operations in the Nordics, Benelux, Germany and Brazil. We are passionate about helping small businesses thrive and grow, by providing them with business loans and credit cards. Right now we’re in an exciting phase of our journey that focuses on growth through smart product development and technology fueled by international expansion.

title: Freelance Software Developer (Python) - AI Trainer
description:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

**About The Role**

 Although every project is unique, you might typically:
   

  

* Generate prompts that challenge AI
* Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers

**How To Get Started**
 Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.
   

  

**Requirements**
* You have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields.
* You have at least 3 years of professional experience with Python
* Code review experience is a must
* Experience with AI projects is a plus
* Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
**Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
* Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
* Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise
